title: How to create an electronic sensor device - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A: You need following (1) A simple 8 bit micro controller. (2) Sensors - Light, PIR (3) Real Time Clock IC Write program. Approximate time will be 2 days Problems : I am not aware if you have skills for electronic assembly and coding. If not, you need a guide to get you started. Tell me more about you and I can be more specific about your first step.

You will need two types of sensors for this, one is the LDR(Light Dependent Resistor) and PIR sensor.LDR will vary the Resistance with the variation in the ambient light. You will have to input analogous signal from this sensor. PIR sensor is basically an Infrared sensor which is readily available in the market. You can find different Interfacing circuits on net.
